name: Play (with me)
description:
I did a collaboration with Dani was about female masturbation. It featured at Death of Glitter, a kink positive, body positive queer space. https://facebook.com/glitterisdead/ 

We 3D printed a vagina that had a joystick under the clitoris which players needed move around and match patterns on the screen.

The game was intended to not be sexual but rather bring a taboo to light.

Art by @seemsnu

Use the arrow keys to steer the player ripple to pulsing ripples an make patterns until you climax. Be quick before the moment fades ;)
